<作者>; <name>;pablogsal</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pablogsal</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /global.discourse-cdn.com/business6/uploads/python1/original/1X/f93ff97c4f381b5e8add5a0c163b4ded29f20ed7.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Python 指导委员会打算批准 PEP 703：使 GIL 成为可选的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intent-to-approve-pep-703-making-the-gil-optional" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://fwsgonzo.medium.com/using-c-as -a-scripting-language-part-8-d366fd98676</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T07:54:56.064153Z</更新>; <link href="https://fwsgonzo.medium.com/using- c-as-a-scripting-language-part-8-d366fd98676"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fwsgonzo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fwsgonzo</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1*yuVzMhCJyDENbyhwAsrkwA.png" style="width: 220px; height : 166 像素;" />;<br />;我之前尝试过内联汇编并取得了一些成功。它很复杂，很容易出错，并且可能会产生奇怪而神秘的副作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-c-as-a-scripting-language-part-8" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36917867" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;阿贡国家实验室正在尝试复制 LK-99</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/spectaulous- superconductor-claim-making-news-here-s-why-experts-are-doubtful</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T02:54:56.065096Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .science.org/content/article/spectaulous-superconductor-claim-making-news-here-s-why-experts-are-doubtful"/>; <作者>; <名称>;登山扣</名称>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=carabiner</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#argonne-national-lab- is-attempting-to-replicate-lk-99" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36916254" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LPython：小说，快速、可重定向的Python编译器</stitle>; <id>;https://lpython.org/blog/2023/07/lpython-novel-fast-retargetable-python-compiler/</id>; <updated>;2023-07- 29T02：54：56.066048Z </更新>; <link href =“https://lpython.org/blog/2023/07/lpython-novel-fast-retargetable-python-compiler/”/>; <作者>; <名称>; fgfm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fgfm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lpython. org/blog/images/lcompilers_diagram.png" style="width: 220px; height: 89px;" />;<br />;LPython 是一个 Python 编译器，可以将类型注释的 Python 代码编译为优化的机器代码。它提供快速编译和运行时性能，以及即时 (JIT) 编译和与 CPython 无缝互操作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lpython-novel-fast-retargetable-python-compiler" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36916182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IBM Blue Lightning：世界上最快的 386？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.os2museum.com/wp/ibm-blue-lightning -worlds-fastest-386/comment-page-1/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T02:54:56.067071Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.os2museum.com/wp /ibm-blue-lightning-worlds-fastest-386/comment-page-1/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;WoodenChair</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=木椅</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.os2museum.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/P1200664-300x225.jpg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 165px;" />;<br />;IBM Blue Lightning CPU，也称为 DLC3，是一款 386 核处理器，具有 486 条指令和具有 32 位总线的三倍时钟变体。它具有 16KB 写入后置 L1 缓存，并且可以使用常规 387 协处理器。Blue Lightning CPU 的性能可与 66 MHz 486DX2 相媲美。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ibm-blue-lightning-worlds- fast-386" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36916297" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SpaceX 在电离层上打了一个洞</stitle>; <id>;https://spaceweatherarchive.com/2023/07/23/spacex-punched-a-hole-in-the-ionosphere/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T21:54:56.068158Z</已更新>; <link href="https://spaceweatherarchive.com/2023/07/23/spacex-punched-a-hole-in-the-ionosphere/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wawayanda</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wawayanda</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spaceweather.com/images2023/21jul23/ redglow_strip2.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;7月19日，SpaceX从加利福尼亚州范登堡太空部队基地发射了一枚猎鹰9号火箭，在电离层中发出红色荧光。当火箭排出的气体导致电离层重新组合时，就会出现这种现象快点。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#spacex-punched-a-hole-in-the-ionosphere" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36913835" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;F# RISC-V 指令集正式规范</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mrLSD/riscv-fs</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T00:54:56.069089Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/mrLSD/riscv-fs"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mrLSD-dev </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mrLSD-dev</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com /3d3af88857328fa9c384afc75e6dad08edb7ed4285445657413472e08cbc1438/68747470733a2f2f6d69726f2e6d656469756d2e636f6d2f6d61782f3234373 42f312a38385a6a2d514a713438495a54694347556f356d53512e706e67”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 84px;" />;<br />;这是 RISC-V ISA（指令集架构）的正式（且可执行）规范，以 F# 纯函数风格编写。我们特意选择 F# 的“极其基本”实现使其可供不了解 F# 且不打算学习 F# 的广大受众阅读和使用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#f-risc-v-instruction-set-正式规范" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36915108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hugging Face、GitHub 等联合起来捍卫开源欧盟人工智能立法</stitle>; <id>;https://venturebeat.com/ai/hugging-face-github-and-more-unite-to-defend-open-source-in-eu-ai-legislation/< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T06:54:56.070124Z</更新>; <link href="https://venturebeat.com/ai/hugging-face-github-and-more-unite-to-defend -open-source-in-eu-ai-legislation/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://venturebeat.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Untitled-design-2023-07-26T065140.440.png?fit= 750%2C469&strip=all" style="宽度:220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;开源人工智能利益相关者联盟呼吁欧盟政策制定者在最终确定欧盟人工智能法案时保护开源创新。该联盟旨在确保开放人工智能开发实践不受阻碍不切实际或适得其反的义务。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hugging-face-github-and-more-unite-to-defend-open-source-in-eu-ai-立法" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36917561" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 Prometheus 原生获取 OpenTelemetry 指标</stitle>; <id>; https://last9.io/blog/native-support-for-opentelemetry-metrics-in-prometheus/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T05:54:56.071070Z</更新>; <link href=" https://last9.io/blog/native-support-for-opentelemetry-metrics-in-prometheus/"/>; <author>; <name>;donutshop</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=donutshop</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://last9.ghost.io/content/images/2023/07/prometheus-opentelemetry-oltp -摄取端点.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;OpenTelemetry 和 Prometheus 是监控和可观察性领域的两个关键项目。Prometheus 中添加了新的功能标志 otlp-write-receiver，支持 OpenTelemetry 指标的本机摄取。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ingest-opentelemetry-metrics-with-prometheus-natively" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36917214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Tremor – 用于快速构建仪表板的 React 库</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tremor.so/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T18： 54:56.072779Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tremor.so/"/>; <作者>; <name>;spansoa</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=spansoa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.tremor.so/tremor_thumbnail.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;模块化组件可轻松构建仪表板。完全开源，由数据科学家和软件工程师制作，具有最佳的设计能力。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#tremor-the-react-library-to-build-dashboards-fast" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36911481" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;Cap'n Proto 1.0</stitle>; <id>;https://capnproto.org/news/2023-07-28-capnproto-1.0.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 28T15：54：56.073604Z </更新>; <link href =“https://capnproto.org/news/2023-07-28-capnproto-1.0.html”/>; <作者>; <名称>;kentonv </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kentonv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://capnproto.org/images/logo .png"样式="宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;经过十年的开发，Cap'n Proto 1.0 版已经发布。此次发布是受到即将推出的 2.0 版的推动，其中将包括对 C++ API 和 KJ C++ 工具包的彻底更改库。版本 1.0 中的更改包括对 Cap'n Proto RPC 性能的优化以及允许 RPC 取消的重大更改。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cap-n-proto-1-0 " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36908309" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</内容>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SQLite-Utils</stitle>; <id>;https:// sqlite-utils.datasette.io/en/stable/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T23:54:56.074539Z</更新>; <link href="https://sqlite-utils.datasette .io/en/stable/index.html"/>; <author>; <name>;dedalus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dedalus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;SQLite-Utils 是一个库和命令行实用程序，可帮助从现有数据集合创建 SQLite 数据库。它提供了实用程序帮助程序，使创建初始数据库并用数据填充它尽可能高效。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sqlite-utils" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36914612" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;英国政府即将在全球范围内侵蚀加密</stitle>; <id>;https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2023/07/uk-government-very-close-eroding-encryption-worldwide </id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T21:54:56.075429Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2023/07/uk-government-very-close- eroding-encryption-worldwide"/>; <author>; <name>;pwmtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pwmtr</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.eff.org/files/banner_library/defend-encryption-cyan-1_0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;英国议会正在推进一项庞大的互联网监管法案，该法案将通过在消息服务中强行设置后门、破坏端到端加密来破坏全球隐私。 《在线安全法案》如果获得通过，将是全球隐私和民主本身的一大倒退。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-uk-government-is-close-to-eroding-encryption-worldwide" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36913268" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从人性的弯曲木料中，没有直的东西被制成</stitle>; <id>;https://theconvivialsociety.substack.com/ p/embrace-your-crookedness</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T18:54:56.076442Z</updated>; <link href="https://theconvivialsociety.substack.com/p/embrace-your-crookedness "/>; <author>; <name>;longdefeat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=longdefeat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws .com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F074c6296-3c12-4a3c-9097-567ac92907be_256x256.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了人性中弯曲的概念及其各种解释。它探讨了这样的观点：弯曲不一定是缺陷或需要解决的问题，而是人类状况的自然方面。作者还反思了试图控制和预测人类行为的技术官僚的烦恼，以及每个人都不断受到监视和评判的社会的潜在危险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#out-of-the-crooked-timber-of- humanity-no-straight-thing-was-ever-made" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36902378" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么 DNS 仍然很难学？</stitle>; <id>;https://jvns.ca/博客/2023/07/28/why-is-dns-still-hard-to-learn/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T16:54:56.078429Z</更新>; <link href="https: //jvns.ca/blog/2023/07/28/why-is-dns-still-hard-to-learn/"/>; <author>; <name>;TangerineDream</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=TangerineDream</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;DNS 从 80 年代就开始使用，互联网上的每个网站都在使用，但它仍然很难学习。 DNS 的复杂性在于不同的 DNS 库、解析器和权威名称服务器之间的对话，以及 dig 等工具的混乱输出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-is-dns-still-hard-to-learn" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36909427" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Wordward Draw</stitle>; <id>;https://managore.itch.io/wordward-draw</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T00： 54:56.079361Z</updated>; <link href="https://managore.itch.io/wordward-draw"/>; <作者>; <name>;lardass</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=lardass</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.imgur.com/fCCkRDx.gif" style="width: 220px;高度：221px；” />;<br />;花了我几天时间，但我终于做到了。我希望看到更多这样的游戏！ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wordward-draw" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36913103" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;审核黑客新闻的孤独工作（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/news/letter-from-silicon-valley/the-lonely-work-of- modeating-hacker-news</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T19:54:56.080265Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/news/letter-from-silicon-valley /the-lonely-work-of-modeating-hacker-news"/>; <author>; <name>;capableweb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=capableweb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/5d4af40ebc1c63000983cdbe/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Wiener-HackerNews.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：114px；” />;<br />;Hacker News 是硅谷流行的链接聚合器和留言板，它融合了科技行业典型的技术痴迷、商业野心和渴望的好奇心。该网站最初是由风险投资家保罗·格雷厄姆 (Paul Graham) 发起的一个副业项目，现已发展到每月吸引数百万读者，但在主持通常会演变为社会、文化和政治辩论的讨论方面也面临着挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-lonely-work-of-modeating-hacker-news-2019" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36911923" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用户数量减少一半以上</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-66336058</id >; <更新>;2023-07-28T16:54:56.081101Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-66336058"/>; <作者>; <名称>;KingOfCoders</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KingOfCoders</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ichef.bbci.co .uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/2A8F/product/_130559801_27fc7ce07f7007e56a3cf6a067822ed37310f8cb.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Meta 老板马克·扎克伯格 (Mark Zuckerberg) 表示，其新社交媒体平台 Threads 已经失去了一半以上的用户。 Twitter 的竞争对手在本月初推出后五天内用户数量就飙升至超过 1 亿。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#threads-users-down-by-more-than-a-half" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36906085" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;USC 光学音效库</stitle>; <作者>; <名称>;mindcrime</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mindcrime</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">; <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#usc-optical-sound-effects-library" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36902050" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;我们吃的所有东西都与癌症有关吗？系统食谱评论（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23193004/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-29T05:54:56.083882Z</updated >; <link href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23193004/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/persistent/pubmed-meta-image.png “样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;营养流行病学是一个多产的领域。关于营养素与疾病风险之间关系的争论在文献中很常见，并引起了公共媒体的关注。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#is-everything-we-eat-linked-with-cancer-a-systematic-cookbook-review-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36917089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;制定PNW高铁计划</stitle>; <id>;https://southseattleemerald.com/ 2023/07/18/plans-develop-for-high-speed-rail-in-the-pnw/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-29T02:54:56.084847Z</更新>; <link href=" https://southseattleemerald.com/2023/07/18/plans-develop-for-high-speed-rail-in-the-pnw/"/>; <author>; <name>;DoreenMichele</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DoreenMichele</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/southseattleemerald.com/wp -content/uploads/2023/07/Shutterstock_1661454721_HighSpeedTrainInMotion_DenisBelitsky_resize.jpg?resize=1038%2C576&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;华盛顿州议会已拨款 1.5 亿美元用于俄勒冈州、华盛顿州和不列颠哥伦比亚省之间的高速铁路连接。华盛顿大学的一份研究报告为成功的高铁项目提供了重要建议。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plans-develop-for-high-speed-rail-in-the-pnw" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36916150" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Costco 的韧性 (2018)</stitle>; <id>;https://minesafetydisclosures.com/blog/2018/6/18/costco </id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T23:54:56.085775Z</更新>; <link href="https://minesafetydisclosures.com/blog/2018/6/18/costco"/>; <作者>; <名称>;awiesenhofer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=awiesenhofer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5693d8b50ab377deeede80ac/1592928006115-HJJ85CJTC8SH7E17VQWO/CleanShot+2020-06-23+at+11.59.56%402x.png?format=750w" style="宽度：220px；高度：1 94像素;” />;<br />;40年来，Costco凭借一个简单的公式取得了成功：将商品利润再投资于更低的价格和更好的产品；是一个遵守纪律的操作者；并善待客户和员工。但随着越来越多的购物者转向网上购物，我们有理由怀疑该公司最好的日子是否已经过去了。下面的甲板将详细探讨这一点。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-resilience-of-costco-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36904785" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;免费监狱电话可促进家庭联系、康复</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2023-07-27/free-calls -restore-inmates-ties-with-the-outside-can-they-reform-californias-prisons-too</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T18:54:56.086785Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2023-07-27/free-calls-restore-inmates-ties-with-the-outside-can-they-reform-californias-prisons-too"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ohjeez</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ohjeez</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/8f3d81e/2147483647/strip/true/crop/3341x2227+0+0/resize/2000x1333!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F% 2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fca%2Fcf%2F066517a34e52ae499a9000d79fb9%2F1326263-la-me-zeara-alvarez-prison-phone-calls-010.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;加利福尼亚州成为美国第二个强制在州立监狱提供免费电话的州，消除了迫使许多低收入人群在与被监禁的亲人保持联系和为餐桌上提供食物。新法律增加了家庭联系，改善了关系，并为被监禁者及其家人带来了情感治愈。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#free-prison -phone-calls-boost-family-ties-rehabilitation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36911361" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;玻璃浸渍钢笔（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://neonaut.neocities.org/microblog/2022/glass-dip-pens</id>; <更新>;2023-07-28T20:54:56.088656Z</更新>; <link href="https://neonaut.neocities.org/microblog/2022/glass-dip-pens"/>; <作者>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://neonaut.neocities.org/microblog/images/pens/dippens.jpg" style= “宽度：220px； height: 294px;" />;<br />;我尝试了玻璃蘸水笔，可以轻松地取样并使用不同的墨水。我订购了一支 Majohn Starry Sky 和一支 Majohn Blue Swirl Capped Dip Pen。两种笔都写得很顺，而且笔帽的笔更舒服耐用。不同的墨水在玻璃蘸水笔上的表现不同。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#glass-dip-pens-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36903282" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
